trans-unit.source: This event does not exist anymore.
This event does not exist anymore.
Unfortunately there are not enough seats left.

Something went wrong with the given event!
The OptIn is diabled! Please look for another way for registration
An e-mail has been send to you. Please click the link in the e-mail to confirm your request.
An error occurred. Please try again.
You have to accept our terms and conditions.
The given E-mail is already used by another user.
No title and time for event given. Event skipped (CSV-LINE:%s).
Event with title "%s" already exists on given Date/Time (%s). Event skipped (CSV-LINE:%s).
More than one possible match in existing data-sets for given event location found. No event location added to event (CSV-LINE:%s).
Invalid country code "%s" given. No country set (CSV-LINE:%s).
Invalid currency code "%s" given. No currency set (CSV-LINE:%s).
No event location given. Event skipped (CSV-LINE:%s).
Event seems to be an internal one, but no BE-User for notifications could be set (CSV-LINE:%s).
Could not find department/topic with id %s. Nothing set (CSV-LINE:%s).
Could not find documentType with id %s. Nothing set (CSV-LINE:%s).
Could not find organizer with id %s. Nothing set (CSV-LINE:%s).
Successfully imported %s events, created %s new event locations and %s new external contacts.
You have to use CSV files.

PID for internal contact; overrides CSV Values when set

Only logged user can register immediately!
trans-unit.target: Bitte beachten Sie: Anmeldungen zu Veranstaltungen werden erst nach erfolgter Bestätigung per E-Mail verbindlich vorgenommen. Loggen Sie sich ein, um sich direkt anzumelden.

trans-unit.source: Please find the details of your reservation for the event "%s" below.
trans-unit.target: Bearbeiten Sie hier die Details zu Ihrer Anmeldung für die Veranstaltung "%s".

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete your reservation for "%s"?
trans-unit.target: Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie Ihre Anmeldung zur Veranstaltung "%s" löschen möchten?

trans-unit.source: Note that all additional participants are deleted, too.
Note that a cancelation may involve additional costs.
Please find the details of your reservation for the event "%s" below.
trans-unit.target: Sehen Sie hier die Details zu Ihrer Anmeldung für die Veranstaltung "%s" ein.

trans-unit.source: We would like to point out that images, sound and video recordings may be made at this event and published in various media for the purposes of event reporting and general public relations. You will receive further information on this and your rights directly at the start of the event.
Important hint: By setting the field targetGroup you agree to receive a survey regarding this product some time after your order. This agreement can be revoked by email to

we are looking forward to see you in a few days at the event below.
